\\[\AgdaEmptyExtraSkip]%

\>[1]\AgdaComment{-- N.B. Ψ is the kernel of 𝑻 → 𝔽(𝒦, 𝑻).  Therefore, to prove 𝑨 is a homomorphic image of 𝔽(𝒦, 𝑻),}\<%
\\
%
\>[1]\AgdaComment{-- it suffices to show that the kernel of the lift h : 𝑻 → 𝑨 contains Ψ.}\<%
\\
%
\\[\AgdaEmptyExtraSkip]%
%
\>[1]\AgdaComment{-- .. code-block::}\<%
\\
%
\\[\AgdaEmptyExtraSkip]%
%
\>[1]\AgdaComment{--    𝑻---- g --->>𝔽  (ker g = Ψ)}\<%
\\
%
\>[1]\AgdaComment{--     \textbackslash{}         .}\<%
\\
%
\>[1]\AgdaComment{--      \textbackslash{}       .}\<%
\\
%
\>[1]\AgdaComment{--       h     ∃ϕ     (want: Ψ ⊆ ker h)}\<%

\>[0]\AgdaComment{--Axiomatization of a class}\<%

\>[0]\AgdaComment{--We conclude the `closure module`\AgdaUnderscore{} by proving that a class 𝒦 of structures is axiomatized by ``Th (VClo 𝒦)``,}\<%
\\
\>[0]\AgdaComment{--which is the set of equations satisfied by all members of the varietal closure of 𝒦.}\<%
